Introducing Bitstamp FastPass

Bitstamp FastPass is a welcome program designed to give you, high-volume traders handling over $500,000 in monthly volume, the benefit of significantly reduced trading fees for up to six months.

Does your monthly trading volume on all other platforms exceed $5M? You can unlock ultra-low fees of 0.01% (1bp) for both maker and taker trades.

Does your monthly trading volume on all other platforms fall between $500K and $5M? You’ll be able to enjoy highly competitive fees of 0.03% (3bp) for maker and taker trades.

It’s a straightforward way to experience Bitstamp’s competitive rates right from the start, with no hidden costs or complicated terms to slow you down. Keep in mind that the reduced trading fees are only available on Pro modes of Bitstamp's web platform and app, so make sure to trade on Pro to get these rates.

How to get started with Bitstamp FastPass?

With FastPass, you’re in control! No barriers, just lower fees. Here’s how the program works:

  • Check if you qualify: To be eligible, you need to have achieved a monthly trading volume of $500,000 or more on other crypto spot exchanges for at least one month within the last three months.
  • Apply by sending proof: Send an email to fast.pass@bitstamp.net with proof of your trading volume. Screenshots of trading history from one or a mix of exchanges are sufficient as documentation.
  • Enjoy your welcome fee offer: If you’ve traded $5M+ monthly, you’ll enjoy 0.01% maker/taker fees. And if you’ve traded between $500K and <$5M monthly, you’ll get 0.03% maker/taker fees.
  • Start saving with 3+3 months of exceptional fees: Once approved, you'll receive a 3-month pricing deal that starts at the beginning of the next month. Hit at least 50% of your customized trading target during this period to extend your reduced fees for an additional 3 months.

Save long-term with Bitstamp
